text: Pauls Putniņš (12 November 1937 – 1 December 2018) was a Latvian playwright, journalist and politician. == Biography == He was born in Riga, Latvia. He was a popular playwright in the 1980s and 1990s, he wrote 30 plays; some 25 of his works were staged across Latvia. A politician, he was a member of Latvian Writers' Union, he was elected to the Riga City Council. He retired in 2010. Putniņš died in Riga on 1 December 2018 at the age of 81.Aizsaulē devies dramaturgs Pauls Putniņš ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Latvian politicians Category:Latvian journalists Category:Playwrights
title: Pauls Putniņš
